<hr>
Read data stored in an online spreadsheet (Google)
```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(gsheet)

personaDF <- gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t730hwcCaMzOB-eLAbHlO5Xlj4HilKfxaRV8LQok8Ko/")
```
